means: 呱呱地叫( croak的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I could hear croaking of the frogs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我能听到青蛙呱呱的叫声.

sentence.Network_en: Someone likened his voice to the croaking of a bull - frog.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人把他的声音比作牛蛙的叫声.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I could hear croaking of the frogs ., 我能听到青蛙呱呱的叫声.
there was almost a wildness in the old man's voice as he spoke , so that Heidi seemed to hear the croaking of the bird again even more distinctly .爷爷在说的时候声音里几乎有一种野蛮的语调，使得海蒂好似又听见了大鸟的鸣叫声，甚至这次听的更清楚了。
The ditches beside the fields were alive with the croaking of frogs ., 田边水沟里青蛙叫声不绝.
I heard toads croaking ., 我听到蟾蜍在哇哇地叫着.

list.abs: 雨发出的声音_百度知道 ... 鸭子嘎嘎叫： Ducks quack. 青蛙呱呱叫： Frogs croak. 小鸟叽叽叫： Birds chirp.
有象声词的句子有那些_百度知道 ... Ducks quack. 鸭子嘎嘎叫。 Frogs croak. 青蛙哇哇叫。 Greese cackle. 鹅咯咯叫。.
After grandpa croaked , I inherited his pickup truck ., 祖父过世后我继承了他的小卡车.

any of several large , heavy-bodied frogs , chiefly of the genus Rana and especially R. catesbeiana , native to America and having a characteristic deep , resonant croak .一种大的，体重的蛙，蛤蟆属，尤指牛蛙原产于北美，有很具特色的低沉的，洪亮的叫声。
He sat on the playground listening to the distant croak ., 他坐在操场上 , 聆听远处的蛙鸣.

entry.tran: (青蛙或鸟)发出低哑叫声，呱呱叫
entry.def: When a frog or bird croaks, it makes a harsh, low sound.

example.ex: Thousands of frogs croaked in the reeds by the riverbank.
example.tran: 上千只青蛙在河岸边的芦苇荡里呱呱叫。

entry.def: If someone croaks something, they say it in a low, rough voice.

example.ex: Tiller moaned and managed to croak, 'Help me.'...
example.tran: 蒂勒呻吟着，用沙哑的声音勉强喊出了一声“救救我”。
她声音沙哑地说了些含糊不清的话。

means.word_mean: 1. a harsh hoarse utterance (as of a frog)
1. like the sounds of frogs and crows;

auth_sentence.content: When I hear Dylan croaking "The line it is drawn, the curse it is cast", a tingle still surges through my old bones.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I hear Dylan croaking "The line it is drawn, the curse it is cast", a tingle still surges through my old bones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I hear Dylan croaking "The line it is drawn, the curse it is cast", a tingle still surges through my old bones.

auth_sentence.content: So in come the calls, croaking and faint even if only claiming a sprained knee, and down goes productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content: So in come the calls, croaking and faint even if only claiming a sprained knee, and down goes productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So in come the calls, croaking and faint even if only claiming a sprained knee, and down goes productivity.

auth_sentence.content: Mona began to cry, snorting and croaking in a way that stung my ear and rang against the fragile skull box of my brain.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mona began to cry, snorting and croaking in a way that stung my ear and rang against the fragile skull box of my brain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mona began to cry, snorting and croaking in a way that stung my ear and rang against the fragile skull box of my brain.
